## Properties

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [flatten](./puppeteer.protocol.target.attachtotargetrequest.flatten.md) | boolean | Enables "flat" access to the session via specifying sessionId attribute in the commands. We plan to make this the default, deprecate non-flattened mode, and eventually retire it. See crbug.com/991325. |
